backend/main.mo: Defines core types for users, drivers, trips, payments, earnings, and authorization state initialization for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests supporting publishing Draft Version 29 to production.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions implementing light/dark OKLCH color system and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring favicon, touch icon, metadata, and mounting the React application.
frontend/ops/publish-draft-v29-to-produc: Production publish checklist outlining verification steps for deploying Draft Version 29.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, role selection, profile setup, approval gating, and routing to dashboards.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalPendingS: Displays an approval-pending UI with instructions and requirements, showing different messaging for drivers versus regular users. Includes email instructions, driver requirements, and next steps using i18n translations.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Form for creating a booking request, including trip details, geolocation capture, driver selection, pricing validation, and checkout session creation. Loads drivers, handles photos, and computes trip distance and pricing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with a button to scroll to a demo video and a copyright line linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the main navigation header with authentication controls, language selector, theme toggle, and user role badge. Integrates Internet Identity login and loads the caller's profile.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or updating user or driver profiles, capturing personal info, geolocation, vehicle details, and uploading photos. Supports driver-specific requirements and submits data for approval.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal for choosing between customer and driver roles, presenting each option with descriptions and selecting one to continue setup.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Large booking form managing service selection, trip details, driver selection, pricing, and checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupCheck: Admin-only dialog prompting initial Stripe configuration and submitting secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/TripDetailsDialo: Dialog showing trip details, progress, pricing, and allows drivers to update status, miles, and loading assistance.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Custom video player component with play, mute, fullscreen controls, overlays, and optional autoplay behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, driver, trip, and related data using the actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Handles language detection, storage, and translation lookup with interpolation and fallbacks.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context provider managing current language, persistence, and translation access.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and structured translation strings for the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a simple hook that returns the i18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard showing approvals, company earnings, and access to the company wallet.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Displays client dashboard with trip stats, active/completed trip lists, and service selection.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyWallet.tsx: Displays company earnings, commissions, deposits, and completed trip metrics using data from Stripe and trip queries.
frontend/src/pages/DriverDashboard.tsx: Shows driver stats, trips, earnings, and allows viewing wallet or trip details with profile and status integration.
frontend/src/pages/DriverWallet.tsx: Calculates and displays driver earnings, deductions, and payouts grouped by payment status.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero content, login buttons, features, and an instructional video.
frontend/src/utils/distance.ts: Provides Haversine distance calculation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/tripPricing.ts: Calculates pricing, fees, and validity for manually entered trip mileage up to 10 miles.
frontend/src/utils/tripProgress.ts: Maps trip status and updates to progress steps, labels, and next driver actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, supporting routing and sensitive token handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, shadows, typography, container settings, and animation extensions.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s versioned state, overall summary, and a list of implemented features with descriptions and metadata.
